title: Weapons
content: ple Harper Sacredstriker 1d6 +1 Bludgeoning(One Handed) 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning(Two Handed) Rare 1.5m VersatileStory Item Spiritual Weapon (6th level): Summon a floating, spectral weapon that attacks your enemies alongside you.Weapon Enchantment +1Topple Hollow's Staff 1d6+1 Bludgeoning +1d4 Necrotic(One Handed) 1d8+1 Bludgeoning +1d4 Necrotic(Two Handed) Rare 1.5m Versatile Heightened Necromancy: Creatures have Disadvantage on Saving Throws against your Necromancy spells.Weapon Enchantment +1Arms of
